title: PersistenceCore v10.4.1
summary:
# Upgrade v10.4.1

This is a proposal to do a software upgrade to [v10.4.1](https://github.com/persistenceOne/persistenceCore/releases/tag/v10.4.1)

This upgrade whitelists the following three new fee denoms:

1. dYdX
2. stkDYDX
3. USDC

By voting YES, you agree to whitelist dYdX, stkDYDX, and USDC as acceptable denom for transaction fees.

By voting NO, you disagree to whitelist dYdX, stkDYDX, and USDC as acceptable denom for transaction fees.

By voting ABSTAIN, you contribute to the quorum but formally decline to vote either for or against the proposal.

By voting NO WITH VETO, you consider this proposal spam, malicious, or harmful and want the depositors penalised by burning their deposit.
